<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Dueling Dance (Fighter)](/Feats.aspx?ID=4834) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=601" />
<trait label="Stance" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=152" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 149 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetypes** [Duelist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=58) (Level 14), [Duelist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=248) (Level 14)

**Prerequisites**
[Dueling Parry (Fighter)](/Feats.aspx?ID=4781)

**Requirements**
You are wielding a single one-handed melee weapon and hold nothing else in your hands

</column>

---

Using a free hand as pivot and balance, you both attack and defend with your weapon. While you are in this stance, you constantly have the benefits of Dueling Parry
